resources.string: Enter the URL of the backend server you want to connect to. This allows the app to communicate with your chosen server for data and services. Ensure the URL is correct to avoid connection issues. The address needs to end with a '/'.
A minimalistic depiction of a smartphone being connected to a server via a URL.
A minimalistic depiction of a circular object, whose one half is the one of a moon, and the other one of a sun, divided by dotted lines.

Customize the appâ€™s visual appearance to match your preferences and surroundings. Choose your preferred theme and contrast settings to create a more comfortable and personalized experience, whether you're in bright or low-light environments.
